original_title: In The Face of What We Remember: Oral Histories of 409 and 555 Edgecombe Avenue
overview: This documentary captures the story of two legendary buildings in Harlemâ€™s Sugar Hill whose residents included W.E.B. DuBois, Elizabeth Catlett, James Weldon Johnson, Thurgood Marshall, Paul Robeson, Louise Thompson Patterson, Joe Louis, Cassandra Wilson, and more.
title: In The Face of What We Remember: Oral Histories of 409 and 555 Edgecombe Avenue
